https://github.com/kristophor/IPSC-Ontario-Chrome-Extension

Introducing the IPSC UX Chrome Extension, a tool designed to enhance your browsing experience on the IPSC Ontario website. This extension was developed to make your experience smoother and more user-friendly by providing a range of helpful features that improve your navigation, reduce distractions, and provide a more streamlined way to interact with the site.

With the IPSC UX Chrome Extension, you'll enjoy a cleaner and more efficient website interface that simplifies navigation and reduces clutter. The extension also optimizes page load times and helps you focus on the content that matters most, removing unnecessary elements that can distract from your browsing experience.

Features of the IPSC UX Chrome Extension include a customized Bootstrap 5.3 navbar that makes it easy to access different sections of the site, a search bar that allows you to quickly find what you're looking for, and a dropdown menu that provides quick access to important information. Additionally, the extension removes elements that are not needed, such as bullets and dropdown menus that cause conflicts with the Bootstrap 5.3 navbar.

Whether you're a new or frequent visitor to the IPSC Ontario website, the IPSC UX Chrome Extension is an indispensable tool that simplifies your browsing experience and makes it easier to access the information you need. Install the extension today and start enjoying a more streamlined, user-friendly website experience!
